Tainan, that idiot samjoe88 is a troll that comes and goes and unfortunately comes back again. And he always posts something that has nothing whatsoever to do with a link he provides - and it's always some bullshit anti-Jewish site.

I figured out it's because he's one of those lefty libtards that thinks Rush is a 'racist', therefore all of Rush's listeners are 'racist'. He's just intellectually lazy and dishonest.

In searching for the right words to eloquently address our dear friend samjoe88, I come across a reoccurring phrase. Brevity truly is the soul of wit. So here goes.....Eat shit and die you human turd.
Thank you J, you came through once again!!
